Sentencas: In the current study, a single cell of a planar SOFC is firstly modeled in 3D using commercial SOFC module of ANSYS Fluent and the results are validated against the experimental investigations in the literature.
Titulo: 3D and simplified pseudo-2D modeling of single cell of a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell to be used for online control strategies

Sentencas: Many researchers have used ANSYS Fluent for simulating solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: 3D and simplified pseudo-2D modeling of single cell of a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell to be used for online control strategies

Sentencas: However, there is a huge gap in the literature on explaining the detailed procedure that should be followed in order to use this software effectively.
Titulo: 3D and simplified pseudo-2D modeling of single cell of a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell to be used for online control strategies

Sentencas: A thorough step-by-step approach is presented to provide a deep insight into the software.
Titulo: 3D and simplified pseudo-2D modeling of single cell of a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell to be used for online control strategies

Sentencas: Thereafter, a simplified quasi-2D method with infinitely shorter computational time is developed and the results are compared with the 3D model.
Titulo: 3D and simplified pseudo-2D modeling of single cell of a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell to be used for online control strategies

Sentencas: It is found that the reduced model is capable of being utilized as an alternate method for both online diagnosis and designing active control strategies.
Titulo: 3D and simplified pseudo-2D modeling of single cell of a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell to be used for online control strategies
